item.description:
By request: Flann O'Brien's is another classic Boston establishment/dive bar for cheap food & beer.

At Flann's great poets are immortalized by lining its walls. At Flann's poets are like gods (not really just kidding). And... since it's so close to Harvard Medical School/Harvard School of Public Health and the Longwood Medical area, and only up the street from Mass Art, The MFA and Northeastern, you get a real interesting mix of patrons at this classic dive bar, that could rival the best pubs in Oxford or anywhere else in the world.

Flann O'Briens
www.flanns.com

1619 Tremont St
Roxbury Crossing, MA 02120
(617) 566-7744

group.name: Brunch & More (20/30-Somethings for brunch & more, etc...)

item.name: Dive Bar - Flann O'Brien's Pub - Near Harvard Med/Longwood Medical Area
